title: ippaDiyum Or piuLLai engEyum illai
sahitya:
(rAgA:  darbAr)   
  ippaDium Or pilLLai engEyum illai inbam tarum tollai idark-kIDiNaiyum illai


anupallavi

  porppuyattE vanamalarum pUppunaiyum (bala) rAmA tappidam-AgAda undan tambiyenrAl aramAmO ippOdE nI shenru engaL mozhi idenru enda vidamO idaya shOdaiyiDam pOi shollu
				(rAg  dhanyAsi)


caraNam 1    eppaDiyum uri kalayam eTTa muDiyA uyaram kaTTi oru vaghai sheidu kAval vaittup-pOna pinnar oppuk-kuTra kAvaluDan uTra tuNaiyAruDanum tappiyuL pughunda undn tambiyenrAl aramAmO
    caraNam 2  				(rAgA:  vasantA)Aa:S M1 G3 M1 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 M1 G3 R1 S  yArenru vinava emmai anjuvOm enru kaNDun pEr sholli unnuDanE pirandOn enrAn pAr ingE vandu tayir pAnaiyuLLEdu enil kAr onrai tavirnda iLam kanronraik-kANumenrAn
    caraNam 3  				(rAgA:  madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  ittanaiyum sheidu pinnar engaL manam nOgumenru muttam onru Indu nAngaL muyangi ninra vELaiyilE kattaik-kuzhal paTri ezhil mikka mayil pIli vaTTam shuTri oru kaiyil kuzhal paTri virandODinAn
